name: Painter Image Portfolio Library
summary: An IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file contains a collection of images used by Corel Painter, an application to create digital artwork. Painter users export portfolio libraries as IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files to preserve them and make it easier to insert images onto their canvas quickly. IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files may store many images, including the piano, guitar, strawberry, tree, candle, and leaf default images.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023
